Articles.Content:
I'm running a livestream mission to land a manned (kerbed?) craft on Duna (return optional). The first half of the mission is now live on YouTube in 3 parts, part one starts below and each episode links to the next.

We're running a whole host of mods to make this mission more challenging, including Remote Tech, TAC Lifesupport and Deadly Reentry... This really is a challenge I have never taken on before, so the outcome is certainly unpredictable!

The second half of the mission will continue live tomorrow at http://twitch.tv/ellbristow at 8:30pm GMT, 3:30pm EST for about 2 hours (give or take) ... come join me and help me land on Duna!
